pages.text: This crop can be useful in combat, if you hold the RMB for a few seconds, the Mandrake will scream in a radius of 5 blocks which applies the $(#f1c232)Stunned$() effect to nearby entities.

pages.title: Feral Mandrake
pages.text: This feral crop can be found in the Forest and Birch Forest biome.
This food item grants the $(#f1c232)Stuffed$() effect for 45 seconds, this prevents saturation from lowering.
